uvi.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v4.14.249
uvi.description:
ipack: ipoctal: fix stack information leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.249 by commit 2725925982dc96a78069cd118ea3d66759bfdad7, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit ba4dc61fe8c545a5d6a68b63616776556b771f51. For more details please see the references link.
